alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:51PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nance, eastern York, northeastern Fillmore, northern Merrick and Polk Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1049 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Wolbach to 6 miles southeast of Silver Creek to near McCool Junction. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. But if any individual storms happen to intensify, larger hail is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... York, Fullerton, Stromsburg, Genoa, Osceola, Shelby, McCool Junction, Silver Creek, Waco, Benedict, Gresham, Belgrade and Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 352 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
